items.content_html: SkeletonJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts HTML elements into animated skeleton loaders. It‚Äôs designed to help you create visually appealing loading placeholders with minimal configuration. SkeletonJS uses CSS custom properties and a default shimmer animation to display skeleton states for your content.
items.title: deepansumor/SkeletonJS:  SkeletonJS is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts HTML elements into animated skeleton loaders. It‚Äôs designed to help you create visually appealing loading placeholders with minimal configuration. SkeletonJS uses CSS custom properties and a default shimmer animation to display skeleton states for your content.
